query:
-- 1. Free-Plan deaktivieren
UPDATE plans SET isActive = 0, isDefault = 0 WHERE slug = 'free';

-- 2. Starter als Default setzen und Limits anpassen
UPDATE plans SET 
  isDefault = 1, 
  taskLimit = 100, 
  teamMemberLimit = 5,
  features = '["basic_templates","upload","download","export_pdf","masking"]'
WHERE slug = 'starter';

-- 3. Business: teamMemberLimit erhöhen und Masking hinzufügen
UPDATE plans SET 
  teamMemberLimit = 20,
  features = '["basic_templates","upload","download","export_pdf","template_sharing","monitoring","team_management","priority_support","masking"]'
WHERE slug = 'business';

-- 4. Zeige die aktualisierten Pläne
SELECT id, slug, name, taskLimit, teamMemberLimit, features, isActive, isDefault FROM plans ORDER BY sortOrder;

-- 1. Free-Plan deaktivieren
UPDATE plans SET isActive = 0, isDefault = 0 WHERE slug = 'free';

-- 2. Starter als Default setzen und Limits anpassen
UPDATE plans SET 
  isDefault = 1, 
  taskLimit = 100, 
  teamMemberLimit = 5,
  features = '["basic_templates","upload","download","export_pdf","masking"]'
WHERE slug = 'starter';

-- 3. Business: teamMemberLimit erhöhen und Masking hinzufügen
UPDATE plans SET 
  teamMemberLimit = 20,
  features = '["basic_templates","upload","download","export_pdf","template_sharing","monitoring","team_management","priority_support","masking"]'
WHERE slug = 'business';

-- 4. Zeige die aktualisierten Pläne
